text: Pathien Lekhabungei murdi hi Pathien phûksân khuma miziek ani sikin chongtak minchuna rang ngei, adikloi rokôkna rang ngei, achâi mindikna rang ngei, le adiktaka lêngna ranga rilnangei rangin mangmunomtak3:16: Pathien Lekhabungei murdi hi Pathien phûksân khuma miziek ania, male mangmunomtak an ni; aninônchu Pathien lekhabu hih Pathien phûksân khum ania mangmunomtak khom ani sa. ani,
